name: miyabi
description: Autonomous AI-powered development framework with 15+ MCP servers, multi-agent orchestration, and comprehensive automation tools for GitHub, Obsidian, and tmux workflows.
rules: Always use MCP tools before manual file operations (P0.1 MCP-First)
Use tmux send-keys with sleep 0.5 for agent-to-agent communication (P0.2 A2A Protocol)
Read relevant SKILL.md files before creating documents (P0.3 Context Check)
Create feature branches before making changes to main
Link all work to GitHub issues
Run cargo clippy and cargo test before commits
Use miyabi-* MCP servers for Obsidian, GitHub, and tmux operations
